SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT t.`TABLE_NAME` AS table_name,t.`TABLE_ROWS` AS table_rows,t.`TABLE_COMMENT` AS table_comment FROM `information_schema`.`TABLES` t WHERE t.`TABLE_SCHEMA`='Restaurant' <%= AND t.`TABLE_NAME` = @@TableName@@%>

SELECT c.`COLUMN_NAME` AS column_name,c.`COLUMN_COMMENT` AS column_comment,c.`ORDINAL_POSITION` AS ordinal_position,c.`COLUMN_KEY` AS column_key,c.`COLUMN_TYPE` AS column_type,c.`DATA_TYPE` AS data_type FROM `information_schema`.`COLUMNS` c WHERE c.`TABLE_SCHEMA`='Restaurant' <%= AND c.`TABLE_NAME` = @@TableName@@%> ORDER BY c.`ORDINAL_POSITION`;

DELIMITER $$
USE Restaurant$$
DROP TRIGGER /*!50032 IF EXISTS */ `trigger_<R%=@@TableName@@%R>_insert_after`$$
CREATE TRIGGER `trigger_<R%=@@TableName@@%R>_insert_after` AFTER INSERT ON <R%=@@TableName@@%R> FOR EACH ROW BEGIN CALL `insert_sys_log`('<R%=@@TableName@@%R>',new.<R%=@@Primary_Key@@%R>,'I','' ,CONCAT(<R%=@@New_Content@@%R>) ,CONCAT('新增:',new.<R%=@@Primary_Key@@%R>),new.CreateUser,0); END; $$
DELIMITER ;

DELIMITER $$
USE Restaurant$$
DROP TRIGGER /*!50032 IF EXISTS */ `trigger_<R%=@@TableName@@%R>_update_after`$$
CREATE TRIGGER `trigger_<R%=@@TableName@@%R>_update_after` AFTER UPDATE ON <R%=@@TableName@@%R> FOR EACH ROW BEGIN CALL `insert_sys_log`('<R%=@@TableName@@%R>',new.<R%=@@Primary_Key@@%R>,'U' ,CONCAT(<R%=@@Old_Content@@%R>) ,CONCAT(<R%=@@New_Content@@%R>) ,CONCAT('修改:',new.<R%=@@Primary_Key@@%R>),new.UpdateUser,0); END; $$
DELIMITER ;

DELIMITER $$
USE Restaurant$$
DROP TRIGGER /*!50032 IF EXISTS */ `trigger_<R%=@@TableName@@%R>_delete_after`$$
CREATE TRIGGER `trigger_<R%=@@TableName@@%R>_delete_after` AFTER DELETE ON <R%=@@TableName@@%R> FOR EACH ROW BEGIN CALL `insert_sys_log`('<R%=@@TableName@@%R>',old.<R%=@@Primary_Key@@%R>,'D' ,CONCAT(<R%=@@Old_Content@@%R>) ,'' ,CONCAT('删除:',old.<R%=@@Primary_Key@@%R>),old.UpdateUser,0); END; $$
DELIMITER ;
